refnamediv.refpurpose: sets the emulated FPS used for fixed physics

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: g_fixedPhysicsFPS sets the emulated FPS value when calculating the artificial rounding error used in g_fixedPhysics. The "magic" numbers to use for this setting are 76, 125, and 333, however, 125 works well and since this value is used as the default for several other mods, it should feel comfortable to most players.
